narratives: Now that you have planted your seeds, you can start harvesting wheat when your crops have grown from seeds to wheat.
The seeds that you have planted will grow into wheat only after a period of time. You can obtain grain by harvesting wheat.
Simply entering [Do harvestWheat] will not work. This is because there may not be wheat and hence, doing the action would be impossible
For this level, we will be introducing a new task called 'If'.
'If' can be used when you want an action to be executed after a certain condition is met.

The format of using an 'If' statement is as follows..
If [condition] [action], Enter [If hasWheat do harvestWheat]~
